Title: Farewell to the Ark
Writer: Gabriel García Márquez (novel), Rio Kishida, Shûji Terayama
Actors: Tsutomu Yamazaki, Mayumi Ogawa, Yoshio Harada, Yôko Takahashi
Plot: A surreal, isolated village sees its inhabitants gradually leave behind their mutual traditions and superstitions as they leave for the city. Among them are two cousins who love each other and who get into a quarrel with other villagers.
